content: **from the description ** tunisian simple stitch forms a grid that lends itself perfectly to cross stitch this bag was designed after a visit to the ukraine inspired by the traditional cross-stitch patterns on towels and shirts plastic canvas provides structure to the barrel-shaped bag **hook sizes ** - i/9 5 5 mm standard crochet hook and - i/9 5 5 mm tunisian hook - adjust hook size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge **notions ** - yarn needle - 4 stitch markers m - plastic canvases two 6 round pieces and one 18 x 15 rectangular piece
